config.title: Configuration
config.description: Manage your server's configuration settings with the following options:

server.title: Server Settings
server.no_permission: You do not have permission to manage server settings.

user.title: User Settings
user.language: `config user language <lang>` - Set your preferred language

ar.title: Autoresponders
ar.name: Name
ar.creator: Creator
ar.no_autoresponders: No autoresponders found in this server.
ar.no_permission: You need 'manage_guild' permissions, the autoresponder edit role, or must be the creator/editor to perform this action.
ar.restricted_placeholders: You need 'manage_guild' permissions or the staff role to use restricted placeholders like {dm}, {interaction}, {delete}, {action}, {role}, {embed}, or staff placeholders.
ar.invalid_name: Invalid autoresponder name. It must be alphanumeric, and spaces aren't allowed.
ar.failure: Failed to perform the action. Something went wrong.
ar.create_prompt_trigger: Please provide the trigger for '{name}' (no placeholders allowed). Reply within 60 seconds.
ar.create_prompt_response: Please provide the response for '{name}' (placeholders allowed). Reply within 60 seconds.
ar.create_prompt_arguments: Please provide arguments for '{name}' (e.g., 'user' for @mention, or 'none' for no arguments). Reply within 60 seconds.
ar.create_prompt_language: Please provide the language for '{name}' (e.g., 'en', 'es'). Reply within 60 seconds.
ar.edit_prompt_trigger: Current trigger: '{trigger}'. Reply with new trigger (no placeholders) or 'cancel' within 60 seconds.
ar.edit_prompt_response: Current response: '{response}'. Reply with new response or 'cancel' within 60 seconds.
ar.edit_prompt_arguments: Current arguments: '{arguments}'. Reply with new arguments (e.g., 'user', 'none') or 'cancel' within 60 seconds.
ar.edit_prompt_editors: Current editors: {editors}. Reply with user IDs to add/remove (e.g., '+123,-456') or 'cancel' within 60 seconds.
ar.edit_prompt_permissions: Current permissions: {permissions}. Reply with permissions to set (e.g., 'edit,delete') or 'cancel' within 60 seconds.
ar.invalid_permissions: Invalid permissions. Choose from: edit, delete, add_language, edit_non_default, add_editors.

embed.title: Embeds
embed.name: Name
embed.creator: Creator
embed.no_embeds: No embeds found in this server.
embed.no_permission: You need 'manage_guild' permissions, the embed edit role, or must be the creator/editor to perform this action.
embed.create_prompt_language: Please provide the language for '{name}' (e.g., 'en', 'es'). Reply within 60 seconds.
embed.edit_prompt_editors: Current editors: {editors}. Reply with user IDs to add/remove (e.g., '+123,-456') or 'cancel' within 60 seconds.
embed.edit_prompt_permissions: Current permissions: {permissions}. Reply with permissions to set (e.g., 'edit,delete') or 'cancel' within 60 seconds.
embed.invalid_name: Invalid embed name. It must be alphanumeric, and spaces aren't allowed.
embed.invalid_permissions: Invalid permissions. Choose from: edit, delete, add_language, edit_non_default, add_editors.
embed.error_invalid_color: Invalid color format, use hex like 0xFF00FF or int.
embed.error_invalid_timestamp: Invalid timestamp format, use ISO like 2025-08-07T12:00:00.
